title: CLEAN - NEW FONT
content:
Friends.  
I created this font and I want to know your critics on this work.  
Thank you.

Marcio  
 [contato@fabrikadetypos.com.br](mailto:contato@fabrikadetypos.com.br)  
 [www.fabrikadetypos.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419054250/http:/www.fabrikadetypos.com.br/ "www.fabrikadetypos.com.br")

author: mhirosse

comments.content:
chop chop and merge elements. Not what I expected when I clicked on the .jpg  
named "Clean". Clean in my opinion is what Lineto does. Not my flavor but I would suggest renaming it.
There is something a little fun in this but why & where would you use it? I think your 'v' needs work.
